sentences.english: The course will discuss the concept of regional economic integration.
sentences.chinese: 区域经济整合已为世界潮流，本课程将加以研析。

sentences.english: Fourth, there is an all-round discussion of the idea of the harmony of the group cultures in the period of transformation.
sentences.chinese: 第五，仔细研析转型时期群体文化和谐的功能。

sentences.english: This paper analyses several controversy problems on the accusation of occupation.
sentences.chinese: 本文对侵占罪的若干争议问题进行了研析。

sentences.english: The second part is the commercial bribe crime certain hard problem analysis.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分是商业贿赂犯罪若干疑难问题研析。

definition: to study and come to a conclusion/to judge/to determine
to comb through (historical documents etc)/to unravel
to consider and decide/to decide after investigating
to study/to probe/to research and examine
to collect and organize (papers etc)/to archive (data)/to summarize (evidence etc)/summary
to take a broad view of sth
to clarify (disparate material into a coherent narrative)/to marshal an argument
